name: Singapore Marriott Hotel

reviews.text: This hotel is in a great location on Orchard Road within walking distance to the major shopping malls. The service and food is outstanding. Be wary of the prices at the ground floor crossroads bar, I was charged $11 for a take away sprite!
reviews.title: fabulous service and location

reviews.text: Extremely nice hotel and excellent location! Stayed here with the family and had a nice room including lounge access. The only negative thing I can mention is that kids are not allowed in the lounge, sometimes understandable but then they should mention this during booking unfortunately this was not the case. I wasn't allowed to take any food or drinks from the lounge which would have solved this situation.
reviews.title: Leisure stay

reviews.text: For the rest it was a pleasant stay and the staff was excellent.
reviews.title: Great location, but service is lacking

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel on two different occasions, both times experienced less than stellar customer service. Location is excellent, without a doubt, but for the price and what other quality hotels nearby offer in customer service, Marriott is at best 3 stars. Rooms are smaller than other nearby hotels, mainly I think due to the shape of the building.
reviews.title: Love Marriott Singapore

reviews.text: What a Brilliant hotel. Right in the heart of Singapore full of kind friendly and happy staff. My friend and I had been on a boat trip for ten days and arriving at the Marriott was truly decadent treat. We spent time relaxing by the pool in between shopping trips. The pool staff were amazing everyday remembering what cocktails we liked and personally delivering them to us pool side. I believe these are the 5 star touches that make hotels amazing. We also loved spending time at the crossroads cafe, best coffee in Singapore by far!
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.text: We stayed in Marriott Singapore in the month of June and really loved the hotel, we had booked 2 rooms and had requested interconnecting rooms, the duty manager was kind enough to upgrade us to the club floor, rooms are very nice and so is the service. The reception staff was very helpful with the information about the city and what to visit they even arranged a cab for us for the tour.
reviews.title: Very Nice

reviews.text: The hotel is located right on Orchard road and is very close to some great eating outlets and shopping.
reviews.title: Very good Place in Singapore!!!

reviews.text: It was a pleasant journey to Singapore and - together with some Friends - we have been there for 2 Nights. Friendly welcomed at Check In and the Staff was friendly to the Guests. We have to say, that there was all very clean and comfortable. Especially it was good at the Breakfast - great!!! We also have been two Times in the Restaurant and it was good and a friendly Service there.
reviews.title: The Best Marriott I Have Been To

reviews.text: In December of 2012, I visited Singapore with my family. We always stay in Marriott's. By far, this is the best Marriott I have ever been to. The pool was amazing, and the view from our room was unreal. The gym had state of the art fitness equiptment, and the basketball court was terrific with a friendly rim. Plus orchard road is a great place to go to malls or pass by ridicuously expensive stores. I loved walking by the stores (although I couldn't afford anything). Also, the valet takes in awesome sports cars. There were Bentleys, Lambos, Rolls Royces, you name it! Boy, it was joy to stay at the Singapore Marriott!
reviews.title: Much too pricey

reviews.text: Even though Singapore is one of the most expensive cities in the world, this hotel is definitely overpriced. The location is great, the pool is lovely but the staff at the front desk could be more courteous.
reviews.title: Great stay on a three week business stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My fiance and I stayed in this stunning hotel for 1 night during a stopover on our way to Europe. We spent the night in one of the executive suites with access to the lovely executive lounge. The food was amazing and the staff were so friendly. The staff were always helpful and willing to assist. We were waited on hand and foot as they say. The facilities at the hotel were very indulgent. The hotel is central to Singapore with the Sentosa cable car 10 minutes away by taxi and the Orchard Road shopping area right across the road. There is also a hop on hop off bus stop just on the corner and the airport is just a short 15 minute drive from the hotel. We would have loved to stay longer but time didn't permit. We have vowed to visit this beautiful hotel again next time we visit Singapore.
reviews.title: "Stunning hotel- Great location"

reviews.text: Stayed here for 5 nights using Marriott Rewards during our Singapore and Phuket vacation in June. Picked it due to location and point useability.
reviews.title: Business Hotel - Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is not a hotel fo family fun. A pure business hotel with excellent location and outstanding service. Food and drinks are very expense (not that I expected anything different from such an expensive hotel).
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel & Staff

reviews.text: We stayed at this beautiful hotel in July for 4 days and it was fantastic. Great rooms and service.
reviews.title: Stay at Marriott Hotel Singapore

reviews.text: Excellent location and close to all shops etc.
reviews.title: A Very Good Business Hotel

reviews.text: We stayed here as part if a family holiday in Asia and really couldn't fault the hotel. The rooms have been recently renovated and were excellent with very nice bathrooms. The gym is up to Marriotts usual standard and the pool area is very well laid out and on the 5th floor so you have good views.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel and good location

reviews.text: The location on Orchard Road is very convenient being right next to the MRT and close to a lot of shops, cages and restaurants.
reviews.title: Does not deserve 5 stars, 4-stars at most

reviews.text: We didn't eat in the restaurants as they were the usual highly priced hotel option but they looked good. Plenty of other options to walk out to.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel, great service

reviews.text: All the staff were friendly and helpful. We were travelling with teenagers and requested adjoining room. Although the email from them said this couldn't be guaranteed when we got there the request had been met.
reviews.title: Great hotel but room for improvement

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a typical Marriott hotel that provides good service and an excellent location. If you want a more "boutique" style hotel I'm sure there are better places to stay in Singapore but from a comfort and location point of view this is great.
reviews.title: Central Location in Singapore

description: The green-roof pagoda is a well-known landmark located at the junction of Scotts Road and Orchard Road. Ideally situated in the heart of Singapore’s bustling shopping and entertainment hub, the five-star hotel is linked to at least four main shopping complexes by an underpass and is directly above the Orchard Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) station, which means the rest of the island is but a train-ride away.
